me.lucko.helper.scoreboard

Interface ScoreboardObjective

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PacketScoreboardObjective

    @NonnullByDefault
public interface ScoreboardObjective
    Represents a specific objective on a Scoreboard.

    • Method Summary

        the current scores

      • hasScore

        boolean hasScore(String name)
        Returns true if this objective has a given score
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the score to check for
        Returns:
        true if the objective has the score

      • getScore

        @Nullable
Integer getScore(String name)
        Gets the value mapped to a given score, if present
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the score
        Returns:
        the value, or null if a mapping could not be found

      • setScore

        void setScore(String name,
              int value)
        Sets a new score value
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the score
        value - the value to set the score to

      • removeScore

        boolean removeScore(String name)
        Removes a score
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the score
        Returns:
        true if the score was removed

        void clearScores()
        Clears the scores from this objective

        void applyScores(Map<String,Integer> scores)
        Applies a score mapping to this objective
        Parameters:
        scores - the scores to apply

        Automatically applies a set of score lines to this objective.

        void applyLines(Collection<String> lines)
        Automatically applies a set of score lines to this objective.
        Parameters:

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(Player player)
        Subscribes a player to this objective
        Parameters:
        player - the player to subscribe

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(Player player)
        Unsubscribes a player from this objective
        Parameters:
        player - the player to unsubscribe

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(Player player,
                 boolean fast)
        Unsubscribes a player from this objective
        Parameters:
        player - the player to unsubscribe
        fast - if true, the removal packet will not be sent (for use when the player is leaving)

      • unsubscribeAll

        void unsubscribeAll()
        Unsubscribes all players from this objective
